problem_names:
lemma ScopeComm:
  fixes x :: name
  and   y :: name
  and   P :: ccs

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>(\<lparr>\<nu>y\<rparr>P) \<equiv>\<^sub>s \<lparr>\<nu>y\<rparr>(\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P)"
translations:
lemma ScopeComm:
  fixes x :: name
  and   y :: name
  and   P :: ccs

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>(\<lparr>\<nu>y\<rparr>P) \<equiv>\<^sub>s \<lparr>\<nu>y\<rparr>(\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P)"
